collation.desc: 38 folios = Ariel Papers: Official Documents in Malayalam. Library Arabic foliation 1-38. It is often the case that a quire of several folios is counted as 1 folio or that a large folio is folded sevaral times and pasted/bound in the volume.

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
